rules.name: Flooding/Spamming
rules.description: Messages that occupy a large portion of the screen or involve the excessive posting of irrelevant content.

rules.name: Excessive Begging
rules.description: Repeatedly asking for favors, items, roles, privileges, or other benefits in an annoying or disruptive manner.

rules.name: XP Farming
rules.description: Sending messages solely to gain XP in the Arcane bot and disrupting the chat, while also being unfair to the legitimate users.

rules.name: Channel Misuses
rules.description: Any kind of misuse in channels under 1 Warning Rules category.

rules.name: Chatting Channel Misuse
rules.description: Using the chatting channels for purposes other than chatting. Includes: Bot commands outside of the Bots channel.

rules.name: Macro Channels Misuse
rules.description: Using channels in the macro category incorrectly.

rules.name: Community Channels Misuse
rules.description: Using the channels in the Community section for inappropriate purposes.

rules.name: Voice Channel Misuse
rules.description: Misusing / improperly utilizing the voice channels.

rules.name: Inappropriate/Suggestive Language
rules.description: Implying/Referencing something inappropriate, offensive, or sexual.

rules.name: Toxicity
rules.description: Engaging in disruptive behavior that can be seen as disrespectful or toxic in any way.
rules.exceptions: Harmless arguments, disagreement about Sol’s RNG related topic, discussions, constructive criticism, debates, joking with consent

rules.name: Advertising/Self Promotion
rules.description: Promoting/Spreading one's media for self gain.

rules.name: Mod Bait
rules.description: Sending messages that appear punishable to provoke a reaction, even though they do not violate rules.

rules.name: Accusation w/o Evidence
rules.description: Making statements or claims about an individual wrongfully and without evidence.

rules.name: DM Harassment
rules.description: Harassing members via DM's due to having mutual access to the Sol's RNG Communication server.

rules.name: Discrimination
rules.description: Harmful stereotyping based on someone’s race, gender, sexuality, religion, or any other personal characteristics.

rules.name: Punishment Evading
rules.description: Leaving to avoid any punishment of any kind.

rules.name: NSFW
rules.description: Content that is inappropriate for any professional or public place, usually including nudity or suggestiveness of any kind.

rules.name: Hate Speech/Racism
rules.description: Any form of imagery or discussions that promotes extreme discrimination and hatred.

rules.name: Child Endangerment
rules.description: Any act that puts minors at harm or inappropriate exposure.

rules.name: Cybercrimes
rules.description: Any form of illegal activity online.

rules.name: Inappropriate Profile
rules.description: Using an inappropriate Discord profile picture, display name, or Roblox username with offensive, suggestive, or explicit content.
rules.consequences: Kick. If rejoined and unchanged, Ban
